(OOC: Sorry for the absence, and sorry for the previous empty post, hit enter to soon.)

Vampirtron:

     Now pinned down to the table and sedated he was starting to calm, his eyes were still red, and if released he would try to attack, although he wouldn't get far. It took him ten times as long to do a simple task now that he was under.

     After a few minutes of struggeling he gave up and conserved his strength. He saw the other transformer in the room, one he hadn't gotten the name of. He was awake enough to speak and make sense. "What is your name?"
